tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE reconciliation_internal_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    internal_data VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_external_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    external_data VARCHAR(255),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reconciliation_type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(20),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_jobs (
    job_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    internal_source_id INT,
    external_source_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(50),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reconciliation_results(
    result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_id INT,
    internal_source_id INT,
    external_source_id INT,
    match_result BOOLEAN
);
